actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: A bill to permit the deferral of repayment of Federal insured, guaranteed, and direct student loans for not more than 6 months of maternity leave.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to permit the deferral of repayment of Federal insured, guaranteed, and direct student loans for not more than six months of maternity leave for an enrolled student borrower.

titles.title: A bill to permit the deferral of repayment of Federal insured, guaranteed, and direct student loans for not more than 6 months of maternity leave.
